name: 蔡佩芳
objective: 介紹生產與服務系統之模擬系統模式建立與分析，以輔助系統設計、改善、管理之決策。本堂課程包含模擬系統模式的基本觀念、模式的建立、模擬資料的驗證與確認、模擬情境的設計與比較、以及電腦軟體的使用，課程重點乃強調實際動手操作以建立模擬電腦模式的能力。
schedule:
Week #1. Introduction to System and Simulation Modeling 
Week #2. Probabilities and Statistics, Queueing Systems
Week #3. Hand Simulation and Spreadsheets
Week #4. Introduction of Arena
Week #5. Modeling Basic Operations
Week #6. Modeling Basic Operations with Animation
Week #7. Modeling a Manufacturing System
Week #8. Input Analysis
Week #10. Modeling Detail Operations: A Calling Center
Week #11. Modeling Detail Operations: Enhanced System
Week #12. What-if Analysis and Simulation Optimization
Week #13. Advanced Module: Steady-State Simulations
Week #14. Advanced Module: Transporter and Conveyor
Week #15. Random Number Generation
scorePolicy:
Class Participation (LAB): 	20%
Homework Assignments:	20% 
Mid-term Exam:			30%
Final - Project Competition:	30%
materials: 郭幸民. (2014), 系統模擬與Arena應用, 滄海書局. (Required)
